config.prompt: miria (unused character) (blue archive), purple hair, red eyes, bandage over one eye, eyepatch, long hair, twintails, bangs, halo, bandaged leg, bandaged arm, pale skin, gothic lolita, dress, black dress, ribbon, thighhighs, detached sleeves
config.history: Miria (also known as Millia) is an unreleased/concept character from Blue Archive, often referred to as the 'Ghost Girl' or appearing in 'The Lost Archive' and PV materials. She is characterized by her gothic lolita attire, long purple twintails, and extensive bandages covering her left eye and limbs. A distinctive pink halo floats above her head. She wields a long, vintage-style musket/rifle wrapped in bandages and carries a creepy-cute ghost doll with a stitched smile. Her single visible eye is red.
